# Jardim et al. (2024): Data and Supplemental Information <img src="man/figures/package-sticker.png" align="right" style="float:right; height:120px;"/>

This is the research compendium containing all analysis in Jardim et al. (2024): **Habitat Complexity Promotes Species Richness and Community Stability:** *a case study in a biogenic habitat*

## Running the code

You can run all analysis and generate the Supplemental Information html file only by sourcing the make.R file once you have forked the compendium.
